Here, I try to keep a list of websites that are using 'preferably' for their
'pkgdown' documentation. Feel free to add your website to the list, or ping me 
on [Twitter](https://twitter.com/@amirmasoudabdol), and I can just add it to the
list.

- [sfthemes](https://sfthemes.amirmasoudabdol.name): San Francisco Themes
- [rticulate](https://stefanocoretta.github.io/rticulate/): Ultrasound Tongue Imaging in R
- [tinymv](https://stefanocoretta.github.io/tidymv/index.html): Tidy Model Visualization for Generalized Additive Models
- [bitmexr](https://hfshr.github.io/bitmexr/): R Client for the bitmex exchange
- [poweRof10](https://powerof10.hfshr.xyz): Tools to scrape data from athletics rankings website
- [tinieR](https://jmablog.github.io/tinieR/): Shrink image file sizes with the TinyPNG API.
- [speakr](https://stefanocoretta.github.io/speakr/index.html): A Wrapper for the Phonetic Software Praat
- [ggstatsplot](https://github.com/IndrajeetPatil/ggstatsplot): Enhancing ggplot2 plots with statistical analysis 📊🎨📣
- [statsExpressions](https://github.com/IndrajeetPatil/statsExpressions): Dataframes and expressions with statistical details
- [broomExtra](https://github.com/IndrajeetPatil/broomExtra): Helpers for regression analyses using broom & easystats packages 📈 🔍
- [pairwiseComparisons]( https://github.com/IndrajeetPatil/pairwiseComparisons): Pairwise comparison tests for one-way designs 🔬📝
- [kittyR](https://github.com/IndrajeetPatil/kittyR): Bring those kitties and their meows to R console 🐈🐈🐈
- [metafor](https://wviechtb.github.io/metafor/index.html): A Meta-Analysis Package for R
- [metadat](https://wviechtb.github.io/metadat/index.html): Meta-Analysis Datasets for R
- [distilltools](https://ellakaye.github.io/distilltools/): A collection of tools to support the creation and styling of content on {distill} websites
- [zipcodeR](https://gavinrozzi.github.io/zipcodeR/index.html): Data & functions for working with US ZIP codes
- [njtr1](https://gavinrozzi.github.io/njtr1/): Download, analyze & clean New Jersey car crash data
- [did2s](https://kylebutts.com/did2s/): Two-stage Difference-in-Differences package following Gardner (2021)
- [Repeatr](https://alexmitrani.github.io/Repeatr/): Analysis and modelling of Fugazi Live Series metadata.
- [jfa](https://koenderks.github.io/jfa/): Bayesian and Classical Audit Sampling
- [overviewR](https://cosimameyer.github.io/overviewR/): Easily Extracting Information About Your Data
